remarks: Show that a given family is a direct product decomposition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
statement:
dmdprd.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
dmdprd.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dmdprd.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
dmdprdd.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
dmdprdd.2 $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
dmdprdd.3 $e |- ( ph -> S : I --> ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
dmdprdd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. I /\ y e. I /\ x =/= y ) ) -> ( S ` x ) C_ ( Z ` ( S ` y ) ) ) $.
dmdprdd.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( ( S ` x ) i^i ( K ` U. ( S " ( I \ { x } ) ) ) ) C_ { .0. } ) $.
dmdprdd $p |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
$d G x y $.
$d I x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d ph x y $.
